title: Katarina Shunpo Ward
body: Hello,  when i play Katarina, very frequently I find that if I Shunpo onto a ward too quickly after placing it I get a BugSplat!  Considering I am a Katarina main this is terribly inconvenient.  I hope this can be solved soon.

replies.body: what? i play kat but never had this happen to me o.o
My assumption is that this only happens on specific settings and play-style / button sequences... it's a very rare crash, that you only get based on how you play.

I've been trying to collect more information about this [Here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/1Y9gpsJZ-we-need-your-ward-jump-crash-reports)
Can you give me more information about how to crash on demand? I've been wrecking my head on this and can not figure that out {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
